original_text: The enemies will take away their king and their leaders. They will take them to another country. The king and the leaders will not be free to return.’ That is what the Lord says. The enemies will take away their king and their leaders. They will take them to another country. The king and the leaders will not be free to return.’ That is what the Lord says. The enemies will take away their king and their leaders. They will take them to another country. The king and the leaders will not be free to return.’ That is what the Lord says.
korean_text: 그들의 왕은 그 지도자들과 함께 사로잡혀 가리라 여호와께서 말씀하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: The enemies will take away their king
and their leaders
They will take them to another country
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들을 다른 나라로 데려갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: The king and the leaders will not be free to return
sentences.korean_translation: 왕과 지도자들은 돌아올 자유가 없을 것이다

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says
